column4: I plugged in a new cd player in my computer.. but it doesnt show up in "Computer" nor in fstab, what should I do?
you should check dmesg to see if it's recognized
they both show up on dmesg.. but both on hdc
can you pastebin the relevant parts of dmesg please?
I hope it is enough, http://paste.ubuntu-nl.org/6959
one is master, the other one slave?
please double check the jumpers on the drives
they should have a little metal thing you can move on the backside
and a drawing showing where it should sit to be slave or master
